MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL48 postcode area of Penrhyndeudraeth affecting a number of properties in the local area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11am in order to re-erect a grounded overhead line , and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10am on the 24th December 2020.
